text: Primary Schools - Cover Supervisors and Teachers Wanted Oakham Education 238 Daily Temp JOB TITLE(s): Primary Schools - Cover Supervisors and Teachers Wanted MINIMUM LEVEL: Cover Supervisor / Teacher / Unqualified / QualifiedKEY STAGE: Key Stage 1 and 2LOCATION: Melton Mowbray, Oakham, Rutland and surroundingsJOB TYPE: TemporarySTART DATE: ASAPDURATION: On-goingSALARY: 90 to 238 per day (day to day) depending on role and pay scale or experience"Your consultant became a good friend of mine and I always appreciated her care and support whilst working for Mana Education. I am delighted to see that her personal service and professional support is ongoing!"WHY APPLY THROUGH MANA EDUCATION?Since 2009, we've acquired insights about schools, including their environment, application process, and candidate expectations. We share this knowledge with our candidates, enhancing their preparation for interviews and giving them an advantage over those entering without such information.SUMMARY INFORMATIONWe're honored to collaborate with this Academy Trust and its exceptional schools throughout the region. Their unwavering commitment to delivering the best education to every child under their care is commendable. Currently, they oversee the education of over 2,000 local students with the support of their fantastic and dedicated team of 500+ staff members.KEY RESPONSIBILITIESAs a Cover Supervisor you will: - Supervise lessons where the work has already been planned. - Deliver learning to pupils. - Create a positive and inclusive learning environment ensuring the smooth running of the classroom. - Managing pupils and their commitment to learn with minimal disruption.As a Primary Teacher you will:- Plan and deliver lessons for varied levels of ability.- Foster proactive and collaborative teamwork within the school community.- Embrace adaptability and flexibility in teaching approaches.REQUIREMENTS - Ideally have your own transport to enable you to get to a variety of schools. - Bachelor's or Master's degree or already have experience within a school. - Good classroom control / behaviour management techniques. - Enthusiasm and commitment. - IT literate. - Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.HOW TO APPLY:Ready to take the next step? 'Apply Now' and let Michele guide you through the process. For more information, reach out to us at:Phone: (phone number removed) or freephone (phone number removed)Email: (url removed)Rest assured, your details are safe with us.
